summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the department of the Parks and Recreation, authorizing the acquisition of 2.63 acres of land within the Southwest Queen Anne Greenbelt for greenbelt and open space purposes and 1.28 acres of land and a 14,272 square foot warehouse facility for use as the Departments West-Central Grounds Maintenance District Shops and making an appropriation from the Park Renovation and Improvement Fund for the acquisition of the warehouse facility.
